DOC.brief_summary: Randomized , double-blind , 2-treatment , 2-period , 2-sequence , crossover study , The study consist screen visit , study center admission ( precede Treatment Periods 1 2 ) , 2 treatment period ( 4 day ) , 1 washout period ( 14 17 day separate period 1 2 ) , exit procedure .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Bioequivalence Different Formulations Risedronate Healthy Male Female Subjects
DOC.criteria: male female , 18 65 year age female , nonlactating either surgically sterile postmenopausal body mass index less equal 32 kg/m2 screening use bisphosphonate within 1 month history GI disease use medication within 714 day prior schedule dosing day
